roleset.name: sign using just a couple letters

example.name: PK says OK
example.text: Taiwan's USI Far East Corp., a petrochemical company, initialed the agreement with an unidentified Japanese contractor to build a naphtha cracker, according to Alson Lee, who heads the Philippine company set up to build and operate the complex.
example.arg: Taiwan's USI Far East Corp., a petrochemical company,
the agreement with an unidentified Japanese contractor to build a naphtha cracker
according to Alson Lee, who heads the Philippine company set up to build and operate the complex

roleset.note: Member of Vncls illustrate-25.3. Checked by Julia, 10/2010.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'initial' based on sentences in wsj.
